issue.title: [CF 1341] Condition for what mark you have
issue.body:
As title states. Maybe this is already in, but I can't find it.

 

Additionally, bring back the 'number of times spell has been casted' condition? I'm too stupid to make counters work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1341 | Raw

comments.body:
Its the very first item under Unit Attributes. I'm going to move it down below the Unit Level condition though, because it really doesn't make sense up  there all by itself.

 

Sure, I'll bring back that condition.

Edited Nov 26, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
